participant_1.background:
I'm proud to have a laptop that can keep up with my active lifestyle.
i love going to the movies.
i listen to folk music.
I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself.
i am a musician with a day job.

participant_2.background:
I would have lunch with my childhood dog, Buddy.
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.

content.text: Hi! What's something good that happened to you today?
I woke up early and reviewed my classes before heading out the door!
That's great! I love starting my day with a plan. What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing soccer, drawing, and reading Asterix comics.
Those all sound like fun! I love folk music and going to the movies. Do you have any favorite hobbies?
I used to play the piano, but I haven't had time in a while. I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself!
That's awesome! I'm a musician with a day job. I'm always looking for new ways to incorporate music into my life.
That's so cool! I'm really impressed. I would have lunch with my childhood dog, Buddy, if I could. He was my best friend growing up.
That's a great idea! I'm sure he would love to see you again.
I'm looking forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
That's so exciting! I'm sure you'll do great things there.
Thanks! I'm really looking forward to it.
